	Three comfortable and  
 supportive bras, including  
 nursing bras if you are  
 planning to breastfeed.  
 Remember, your breasts  
 will be much larger than  
 usual.
	About 24 super-absorbent  
 sanitary towels.
	Breast pads x 24.
	Your wash bag with  
 toothbrush, hairbrush,  
	 flannel,	etc.
	Fruit juices and boiled  
 sweets to give you  
 energy in labour.
	Towels, preferably not  
 white.
